sentences.sContent: We all went back to our respective homes to wait for news.
sentences.sCn: 我们都各自回家等待消息。

sentences.sContent: the respective roles of teachers and students
sentences.sCn: 教师和学生各自不同的角色

trans.tranOther: used before a plural noun to refer to the different things that belong to each separate person or thing mentioned
